Up to 200-inches projection size, equipped built-in 10 Watts audio original fidelity stereo, show you unparalleled cinematic experience. A perfect movie night!

UNLIMITED ENJOYMENT: Projector fully enclosed display design to eliminate dust pollution, LCD diffuse reflection technology creates a softer image which is healthier compares to traditional television. Also Bluetooth function able to wireless docking headphones, enjoy your own entertainment quietly,accompany you with anytime anywhere.

100% COLOUR WORLD: The new technology's LED bulbs simulate natural light, providing a balance of brightness and contrast. 200 ANSI - 9500 lux brightness,advanced LED light sources adopts the latest 4.0 LCD display.Whether you are playing video games or watching movies, show you an immersive experience.

MULTIMEDIA PORTABLE PROJECTOR: Simple HDMI connection for an unprecedented zero latency game combat sense. Multiple port selection with USB, AV, VGA, HDMI, TF Card. Compatible with TV Stick,PS4, PS5, NS, XBOX,Wii and Usb Flash Drive.

IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: The projector with 3-month return guarantee and 3 years of technical service support. Asnish multimedia projector is definitely the best choice for holiday gifts. A home theater with powerful sound and large size screen for your family in this weekend !

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can this projector play Netflix? Due to the copyright of video sites such as Netflix Hulu and Disney+, almost projectors on the market are not compatible Online Streaming when cast screen via USB CABLE or Wi-Fi. Recommend to use an HDMI cable to connect the projector with laptop or Roku/TV stick to play these videos. Can this projector play cell phone picture? You need an apple lightning to HDMI adapter/ type C HDMI adapter to connect the projector. HDMI adapter not included. How to connect projector via Cell phone Bluetooth function? Bluetooth can only be used to connect sound devices such as speaker/Headphones, not to computers or smartphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Projector and great sound
reviews.reviewText: The product's physical size is comparable to normal (much higher priced) projectors. The cloth finish on top and rugged plastic bottom make for a sleek and modern finish. Package comes with:Power Cord, Power Adapter, HDMI and a RCA Connector cable, and of course the projector itself (with protective lens cover).The video inputs are plentiful. USB, VGA (PC), HDMI (2 of these) and a memory stick card. I believe there is one more I'm forgetting but overall it is stacked with all sorts of modern inputs for any of your devices (we tried Apple TV, Roku stick and even a PC with HDMI and VGA connections). A couple of Audio outputs are also in the mix, to hook into a higher end stereo/surround sound system.The unit's image quality on the wall was surprisingly sharp (once the shape was modified and the focus was adjusted) and plenty of brightness. I can see us using this many times over the course of the warmer season (outside) and my kids already want to do movie nights inside (project it in a large screen in our garage).The best feature for the money spent is the Audio. This has what would sound like a relatively higher end wireless speaker (not perfect quality, but not had enough treble and base to produce higher quality sounds). I was skeptical about the audio unit being inside the projector at first, but once I listened to it, I was pleasantly surprised. There are always the Audio-Out ports to direct the sound into a surround sound system, but if you are using it at a campground or a small outdoor venue, the audio on this will fit the needs without sacrificing the ability to hear it clearly.Overall this projector is a wonderful sized unit, very inexpensive and produces great video and audio from an all in one unit. I recommend for anyone looking to get into the projector arena with their kids and who knows. You will likely find yourself watching movies with friends and family on a regular basis.This product does a great job and I highly recommend it to anyone even remotely interested and should provide you years of entertainment. Very inexpensive, impressive quality of video and wonderful entertainment for family on a nice summer evening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son and he loves it!! He’s able to connect it to his Xbox and play games on it, watch movies and so much more. Great Christmas gift and even better price! Only paid $60 for it and it was well worth the money!! The picture is clear and the sound quality was pretty good. He connects it to his hive speakers and has instant surround sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the Price
reviews.reviewText: This is replacing an Epson DLP 1080P projector that we use about once a month for family movie night and camping. The Epson had no onboard speakers and a VGA input. The HDMI to VGA conversion cable was quirky and sometimes did not work. I also had to plug in external speakers which was a pain.This unit had HDMI input and built-in speakers which was what I needed. It's not much smaller than the Epson, but it's lighter.Pros- It's low cost- Decent video quality- Decent brightness- Light weight- Built in Speakers- Remote- Onboard controls- It can be hung from your ceiling- Can project up to 200 inch screenCons- Video image quality is a bit fuzzy (especially at edges)- Speaker sound quality is poor- Manual image adjustments (which does not bother me)- Needs to be mostly level with screen- No case- No internal internet apps (we have an Amazon Fire cube, so not an issue)- External Power Supply (seriously stupid)Overall, I am happy with my purchase for the cost. Not looking for a high-end unit, but more of something we can use camping and occasionally for movie night. For these needs, it's perfect. If you are looking for a light use, low resolution projector at a low cost, this will work fine for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Quality and sound
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I spent weeks looking at reviews for different projectors and I’m soooo happy I chose this one. The quality is literally perfect. Easy to assemble/power on. Connects with my fire stick. The volume is really loud, and I only put it on 10 haha. And I cannot stress this enough the qualityyy!!!! And for this price ?! Pleaseee get this projector, money well spent !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids love this!
reviews.reviewText: I am glad we bought this screen and projector. It has been so much fun to have for camping as well as parties and just all around fun nights this summer. The price for this bundle is not bad compared to others and it works great in my opinion. It is also easy to operate and set up. We just hang ours as we go and at times we just shine the projector on the white siding of the house as well. If you are looking for something fun to do I recommend grabbing one of these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sound randomly doesn't work.
reviews.reviewText: I have had this product for less than a year. I started using it regularly about a month ago and the sound randomly cuts out and will not work at all for hours at a time. I have tried to run the sound through a Bluetooth speaker, paired with an Alexa device and through the projector itself. It does this same thing with each choice. There is no option anywhere on my order or on the product page on Amazon to contact the seller. The help function for this product says to contact the manufacturer but the website it lists takes me to a patio furniture website that has no electronic products. The trouble shooting provided does not help. Amazon keeps telling me to contact the seller but there is no option to do that. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality picture and equipment size!
reviews.reviewText: For the price it think this is great! I was originally looking for a mini size but this model change all my expectations. Really good quality picture and the sound is great!I have it connected to my google chrome cash and it makes streaming easier:))

reviews.reviewTitle: Good and fantastic easy to operate and use.
At first I thought it was a good purchase
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. At first, I was happy, the throw range was smaller than other projectors. Though soon enough there was projecting errors in the both top corners (15 days), so I will be returning it. The picture is clear and the writting is clear, red is more red than cheaper version, so I found. You can choose the aspect ratio to just scan, so it works well when I am streaming, but I suppose, what do you really expect for a $240 projector, you may buy one and not get a fault, if you do "Great", it is worth the money, as the sound is not even really to bad. But if you do, remember to keep the Packaging incase you need to return it.EDIT: After contacting the seller in regards to the issue, I was very impressed with the customer service and all my issues were solved beyond my expectations with needing to contact Amazon directly.
